North_Little_Rock.Barney L. Elias House:
The Barney L. Elias House is a historic house located at 335 Goshen Avenue in North Little Rock, Arkansas.


== Description and history ==
It is a large Modernist brick structure, built in 1949 by local builder Barney L. Elias for his family. It is an early example of Modern architecture in Arkansas, using brick and poured concrete, and metal frame windows, as residential building materials.
